inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: LDL-C and HDL-C levels were 545 and 53 mg/dL, respectively

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: fasting glucose and triglyceride levels (85 and 158 mg/dL, resp.) were within normal limits

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no other cardiovascular risk factors such as smoking, high blood pressure

exclusion.criterion: blood lipid modifying medications and/or supplements drugs and/or hypertension
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient reported no use of lipid-lowering medications

notes: Patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery (LICA) and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery (RICA).
